div.style: position: absolute; top: 20%; width: 100%; right: 5%; text-align: center; transform: translate(-50%, -50%); color: black; font-size: 17px; font-weight: bold; text-shadow: 2px 2px 5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7);

tr.t-att-class: 'bg-200 fw-bold o_line_section' if line.display_type == 'line_section' else 'fst-italic o_line_note' if line.display_type == 'line_note' else ''

t.t-value: ', '.join([(tax.description or tax.name) for tax in line.tax_ids])

td.name: td_taxes
td.t-attf-class: text-start {{ 'd-none d-md-table-cell' if report_type == 'html' else '' }} {{ 'text-nowrap' if len(taxes) < 10 else '' }}

div.p:

on this account:
